text: إِذۡ جَآءَتۡهُمُ ٱلرُّسُلُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمِنۡ خَلۡفِهِمۡ أَلَّا تَعۡبُدُوٓاْ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَۖ قَالُواْ لَوۡ شَآءَ رَبُّنَا لَأَنزَلَ مَلَـٰٓئِكَةٗ فَإِنَّا بِمَآ أُرۡسِلۡتُم بِهِۦ كَٰفِرُونَ

translation.en: [That occurred] when the messengers had come to them before them and after them, [saying], "Worship not except Allah." They said, "If our Lord had willed, He would have sent down the angels, so indeed we, in that with which you have been sent, are disbelievers
translation.id: (Ketika para rasul datang kepada mereka dari depan dan dari belakang mereka773) (dengan menyerukan), "Janganlah kamu menyembah selain Allah!" Mereka menjawab, "Kalau Tuhan kami menghendaki tentu Dia menurunkan malaikat-malaikat-Nya, maka sesungguhnya kami mengingkari wahyu yang engkau diutus menyampaikannya
